__e: All right, you take one down, you pass it around 99 bottles of beer on the wall.
I know. I know. There will be 47 bottles of beer on the wall.
Uh, call me picky, but isn't that song actually "A hundred bottles of beer on the wall"?
I don't remember drinking four bottles of wine, and that's not the kind of thing you forget.
I just don't drink 3 bottles of wine on my own.
What am I gonna do with a bunch of wine?
I stand around and have to take the bottles out of the machine ...
They go through $1,000 bottles like it's water.
Can I have two bottles of that, please?
Uh, Dad... shouldn't you save a couple bottles for when you're a little higher?
And then, her father bought all that booze that nobody drank.
And there's enough for you to maybe take a couple of bottles for yourself.
We-we split a couple of bottles, and that's the last I remember.
Nothing but a loud popping of corks, and we can't seem to track them down.
I saw a bunch of people on TV throwing bottles and stuff at a police car.
And I know what he might have been doing with that bottled water.
I really wanted to... walk up to you and say I had two bottles of water, and that I knew where the car was.
How about a guy who leaves bottles of water for you in the road?
We never knew why, but whenever there was a party in the house... uncle Pedro would collect all the empty bottles he could find.
- Yes. And tell the boys not to slam down the bottles of mineral water.
You know, you can use one of the empties in the back if you really can't hold it.
Why aren't the bottles delivered yet?
If you want another drink, the good stuff is underneath the bar. Thanks.
